00042 // TeapotController Implementation
00044

00046 //
00047 // TeapotController::TeapotController                   - Chapter 19, page 769
00048 //
00049 TeapotController::TeapotController(shared_ptr<SceneNode> object, float initialYaw, float initialPitch)
00050 : m_object(object)
00051 {
00052         memset(m_bKey, 0x00, sizeof(m_bKey));
00053 }
00054 
00055 
00056 
00057 //
00058 // TeapotController::VOnLButtonDown                             - Chapter 19, page 769
00059 //
00060 bool TeapotController::VOnLButtonDown(const CPoint &mousePos)
00061 {
00062         optional<ActorId> aid = m_object->VGet()->ActorId();
00063         assert(aid.valid() && _T("The teapot controller isn't attached to a valid actor!"));
00064         safeQueEvent( EventPtr( GCC_NEW Evt_Fire_Weapon( *aid ) ) );
00065         return true;
00066 }
00067 
00068 
00069 
00070 //
00071 // TeapotController::OnUpdate                           - Chapter 19, page 769
00072 //
00073 void TeapotController::OnUpdate(DWORD const deltaMilliseconds)
00074 {
00075         if (m_bKey['W'] || m_bKey['S'])
00076         {
00077                 safeQueEvent( EventPtr( GCC_NEW Evt_Thrust(*m_object->VGet()->ActorId(), m_bKey['W']? 1.0f : -1.0 ) ) );
00078         }
00079         if (m_bKey['A'] || m_bKey['D'])
00080         {
00081                 safeQueEvent( EventPtr( GCC_NEW Evt_Steer(*m_object->VGet()->ActorId(), m_bKey['A']? -1.0 : 1.0 ) ) );
00082         }
00083 }
